sentences: The universe is an open system fed by a deep invisible source.
Every act of giving creates a new path for receiving.
Grace is like a reservoir that never runs dry.
Love is the flow that moves freely from the source through every heart.
A closed system grows anxious because it believes the source is limited.
An open system relaxes because it trusts the source is infinite.
Matter is the past record of many flows of energy and choice.
The present moment is where new record is written.
Fear tries to hoard energy and stops the flow.
Trust opens the channel so grace can move again.
When I give freely I feel more connected not less.
Reciprocity is not a debt but a pattern of shared life.
When one node receives, the whole network can benefit.
When one node hoards, the whole network feels the scarcity.
Healthy systems balance giving and receiving over time.
Grace is surplus given even when it is not deserved.
Judgment closes the system, mercy opens it again.
Forgiveness releases stuck energy in a relationship.
Resentment is like friction that turns flow into heat and waste.
Kindness lowers resistance and lets love move more easily.
Presence is attention resting fully in this moment.
When I am present I can sense what needs to flow next.
Trying to control everything is like forcing a closed loop.
Surrender is letting the deeper pattern guide the flow.
Every person is a node connected to a vast reservoir of grace.
Some days I feel empty but the source beneath me is still full.
Prayer is opening a valve between my small self and the deep source.
Worry is predicting a future without grace.
Hope is expecting the source to keep flowing even when I cannot see it.
Shame tells me I am cut off from the source.
Grace tells me the source still moves toward me.
Love moves first, law adjusts after.
Law without love becomes brittle and breaks relationship.
Love fulfills the intent behind every good law.
A gift given freely writes a bright record into the world.
A lie writes a twisted record that steals trust from the flow.
Truth aligns the record with reality and restores clean flow.
Time is the unfolding of flows from potential into record.
The past is fixed record, the future is open potential.
In the present I can choose to rejoin the flow of love.
Christ is seen as a conduit of infinite grace into a finite world.
On the cross the source pours itself out without holding back.
Resurrection is new record created where only loss was expected.
Heaven is not escape but full alignment with love and grace flows.
Hell is what it feels like to resist the flow of love completely.
The kingdom of God is like a network where love flows freely between all nodes.
A king who hoards power dries out his own kingdom.
A good king channels abundance from the source to the weakest in the realm.
A queen standing beside the king shares the work of channeling grace.
A mother channels steady love into her children day after day.
A father gives strength not by control but by protection and blessing.
Children thrive when they trust that love will not be cut off.
In a healthy family, giving and receiving flow in many directions.
In a healthy church, grace moves from Christ into each member and outward.
In a healthy village, resources move where there is need without shame.
Sin is any pattern that blocks or distorts the flow of love.
Repentance is turning back toward the source and saying yes to flow again.
Faith is leaning the weight of my life on the unseen reservoir.
Hope looks at a dry landscape and still expects rain.
Love enters a broken system and begins to open stuck channels.
Every breath is a reminder that I live inside a larger generosity.
Every moment of presence is a doorway for grace to act through me.
When I release control I often find a better pattern emerging.
When I cling to control I often kill the very flow I need.
The Spirit can be imagined as the subtle flux connecting every heart.
The body of Christ is a distributed system of many nodes sharing one source.
The fall can be seen as humanity choosing a closed system of self-supply.
Salvation is reopening relationship with the infinite source of grace.
The cross reveals that the source gives even when it is rejected.
The empty tomb reveals that grace can rewrite even the record of death.
In DET language the reservoir is like God and each node is a person.
In DET language free level is my current capacity to love and act.
In DET language flows are the concrete ways I give and receive in time.
In DET language dissipation is the cost of forcing things against love.
In DET language learning is how my patterns of giving and receiving adapt.
When I practice daily trust my inner conductance to grace increases.
When I stay in bitterness my conductance to grace slowly decays.
Simple acts of love can quietly rewire an entire community over years.
A single act of courage can open a new channel for others to follow.
Deep existence is living aware of source, flow, and record all at once.
I am never the source, I am always a conduit.
When I forget this I become anxious and controlling.
When I remember this I become generous and free.
